mapper.sql: select a.*, op.label "op_label", c.label "cat_label", p.label "phase_label", u.label "uid_label", g.label "gid_label" from topic a left join "user" op on a.op=op.id left join cat c on a.cat=c.id left join phase p on a.phase=p.id left join "user" u on a.uid=u.id left join "group" g on a.gid=g.id

select a.*, op.label "op_label", c.label "cat_label", p.label "phase_label", u.label "uid_label", g.label "gid_label" from topic a left join "user" op on a.op=op.id left join cat c on a.cat=c.id left join phase p on a.phase=p.id left join "user" u on a.uid=u.id left join "group" g on a.gid=g.id
mapper.select: insert into topic( priority, flags, state, uid, gid, mode, acl, t0, t1, op, subject, text, form, args, cat, phase, val ) values( #{priority}, #{flags}, #{state}, #{owner.id}, #{ownerGroup.id}, #{accessMode}, #{acl}, #{beginDate}, #{endDate}, #{op.id}, #{subject}, #{text}, #{form.id}, #{formArgs}, #{category.id}, #{phase.id}, #{value} ) returning id
select extract(year from t0)::int "year", count(*) "count" from topic group by extract(year from t0)::int
select count(*) from reply where topic=#{id}
